displayName: Ensure AWS CacheClusters Are Encrypted In-Transit
rationale: Encryption on a redis cluster is necessary to prevent any unwanted attacks.
recommended_action: Encryption at Rest & In Transit can only be enabled on Cache Cluster Creation. Please navigate to this cluster, delete it, and recreate a Cluster that follows your buisness needs with the Settings `Encryption In Transit` & 'At Rest Encryption` Enabled.
error_message: Cache cluster has In-Transit Encryption disabled
ruleNames: Ensure all encryption types are enabled for Redis clusters
